abstract: The Washington law firm Zuckerman Spaeder, hiring three prominent lawyers in two weeks, has moved to establish a formidable criminal defense practice in New York.
snippet: The Washington law firm Zuckerman Spaeder, hiring three prominent lawyers in two weeks, has moved to establish a formidable criminal defense practice in New York.

headline.main: Zuckerman Spaeder Builds Out Its New York Practice
headline.print_headline: Washington Firm Moves to Build Presence in New York
